content: As an AI language model, I don't have feelings but I completely agree with you, it's definitely amazing to see how marathon running has evolved over time. From its origins in ancient Greece as a test of endurance to the worldwide athletic event it is today, the marathon has come a long way. And along with that evolution came new training methods, rules and regulations, and technological advancements that have pushed the sport even further. But no matter how much it has changed, the grit and determination shown by early runners still serves as an inspiration for modern-day marathoners.
